Content_wSideColumn.Name: Registration
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Registration
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Continuing Education has provided a Registration information/Cost page for Quest Winter semester

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
• The Quest - Winter program cost, excluding tuition, is $3540:
  • Quest Fees Deposit: $500 - (Non-refundable if you cancel)
  • Remaining Quest Fees: $3040 (due by December 1, 2012)
  • Tuition: $145 per credit/$1735 for 12 or more credits (due by January 11, 2013)
  • Fee payments may be made by Visa or Master Card only

Quest Fees cover:

  • Food and housing at Badger Creek (incl. free laundry access)
  • Grand Targhee season pass
  • Transportation between Badger Creek and Grand Targhee at least twice per week
  • Unlimited access to Badger Creek cross country ski trails and cross country ski equipment
  • Transportation between Badger Creek and the BYU-I campus at the start and end of the program
  • Sponsored activity fees and all class fees
  • Computer and internet access at Badger Creek

Register Online

Registration for the program is on a first-come, first-serve basis, and opens at 8:15am MST on November 1st.  The $500 non-refundable deposit is due when you register. Quest - Winter is limited to 30 participants.

To Register:

  1. Verify that you meet the participation requirements.
  2. Registration for Quest is open now . To register, please use the links below.
  3. Register for courses 7 November 2012 at 8:15am MST, through the BYU-I Registration System.

***We are using the BYU-Idaho Ticket Office sales site as a temporary registration system for our Quest program.  Your $500 deposit is the purchase price of your Quest 2012 "ticket" and enrolls you in the program.  Visa and MasterCard are accepted online, or you may call the Ticket Office  number listed at the link below. ***

*** You will need a BYU-Idaho NET-ID and PASSWORD to purchase your registration ticket online.  If you haven't already created one, please go to  www.byui.edu/netid .  If  you have trouble creating a Net-ID, you can call the Ticket Office and make your purchase by phone.***
